sentences.sContent: Howard and I share the first broad beans, raw, straight from the pod, the essence of green, an English summer.
sentences.sContent_eng: Howard and I share the first broad beans, raw, straight from the pod, the essence of green, an English summer.
sentences.sCn: 英国的夏天，我和霍华德分享了第一次收获的蚕豆，直接从豆荚里剥出来的——真正的绿色。

trans.tranOther: to remove the pod or shell from (peas, beans, etc)
a long narrow seed container that grows on various plants, especially  pea s  and beans
